BNC User Reference Guide

<imprint>

imprint groups information relating to the publication or distribution of a bibliographic item.
Declaration 
element imprint
{
   attribute n { text }?,
   ( pubPlace | publisher | date | pp )*
}
Attributes
(In addition to global attributes)
n internal identifier.
Status: Optional
Datatype (1–1) text
Example
 <imprint n="JOHNMU1"
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">
  <publisher>John Murray (Publishers) Ltd</publisher>
  <pubPlace>London</pubPlace>
  <date value="1989">1989</date>
 </imprint>
Module core
